channel.title: [317] how make my interface apear on log in[317]
channel.description: ok i have created like a interface to say my server news ect and i want it to apear on log in how do i do that also i have created a button saying "play now" how do i make this work? im using preject covis as source [delta] think...

item.title: [317] how make my interface apear on log in[317]
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:7, topic:293758"][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=388671.msg2905196#msg2905196 date=1249756178]
showInterface(****);

Mitko, would it work if it went under login()?
[/quote]

the ‘login’ method for 317s is initialize (for wL servers)[/quote]Oh, k thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] how make my interface apear on log in[317]
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

add it in your initiliaze method.

showInterface(IntID)

or… if you’re loading all of your login stuff from a void

just add the showInterface into your startup method

Read full topic
